"YEE-OW!"  Jayde narrowly avoids getting burnt, and she empties her 
nailgun's magazine against Starstorm.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> "That's not a comfort"replied the femme while she tried to avoid 
the 
> shots of both bots. Quicly she Transformed to her beast mode and 
spat 
> fire with her three heads against Blackfang and Jayde
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang muttered: It's nothing personal, but you're a Pred... 
Not
> > that I'm happy with it.
> > 
> > He fires four times at the dragon-lady.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Jayde avoids the shots coming her way and scoots around behind 
> > > Starstorm.  "Big talk for an enemy," she sneers, loosing a 
volley 
> > > from her nailgun.  She's pulled this crossfire-on-demand tactic 
a 
> > > gazillion times, just never with a Maximal as a partner.
> > >

> > > <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Starstorm:
> > > > 
> > > > Starstorm was camly fixing her nails when she saw the shots 
> > > came "Oh 
> > > > my....!!!"
> > > > 
> > > > Before shots hit her, she spread her wings and took off "HEY 
> > > > YOU!!!!" shouted angered the femme "WHY ARE YOU TREAD ME 
> BAD!!!! I 
> > > > JUST WAS WATCHING THE ROUND!!!!"
> > > >

> of his

loaded 
> in

> > > > > shotgun.
